summary_1.position: ASSOCIATE SENIOR LECTURER (TENURE TRACK) in AI for SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
summary_1.research_focus: using and developing (generative) AI to improve software development processes as well as the quality of software artefacts
responsibilities: research, teaching, and supervision in software engineering
actively participate in leading and developing the department's research and educational activities
applying for external research funding, nationally and internationally
lectures, practical elements, and course development at undergraduate and graduate levels in software engineering
supervision of degree and project work at undergraduate and graduate levels
opportunity for the supervision of doctoral students

employment_terms.resources: resources to finance one doctoral student

summary_1.collaboration: part of the strategic research area in IT and mobile communication, ELLIIT, a partnership between Linköping University, Lund University, Halmstad University and Blekinge Institute of Technology

eligibility.qualifications: a person who has completed a doctoral degree or has equivalent scientific competence
eligibility.preference: Preference should be given to those who were awarded a doctoral degree or attained equivalent competence no more than five years prior to the application deadline
eligibility.special_considerations: Persons who have been awarded a doctoral degree or attained equivalent competence earlier can be considered for employment if special reasons exist. Special reasons refer to leave due to illness, parental leave, or other similar circumstances
